Returns: the vertical offset of the scrollbar's thumb
computeVerticalScrollOffset().Description: Compute the vertical offset of the vertical scrollbar's thumb within the horizontal range. This value is used to compute the position of the thumb within the scrollbar's track. The range is expressed in arbitrary units that must be the same as the units used by @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeVerticalScrollRange_E@ and @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeVerticalScrollExtent_E@. The default offset is the scroll offset of this view.

Returns: the horizontal offset of the scrollbar's thumb
computeHorizontalScrollOffset().Description: Compute the horizontal offset of the horizontal scrollbar's thumb within the horizontal range. This value is used to compute the position of the thumb within the scrollbar's track. The range is expressed in arbitrary units that must be the same as the units used by @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeHorizontalScrollRange_E@ and @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeHorizontalScrollExtent_E@. The default offset is the scroll offset of this view.

Returns: the total horizontal range represented by the horizontal scrollbar
computeHorizontalScrollRange().Description: Compute the horizontal range that the horizontal scrollbar represents. The range is expressed in arbitrary units that must be the same as the units used by @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeHorizontalScrollExtent_E@ and @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeHorizontalScrollOffset_E@. The default range is the drawing width of this view.

Returns: the vertical extent of the scrollbar's thumb
computeVerticalScrollExtent().Description: Compute the vertical extent of the vertical scrollbar's thumb within the vertical range. This value is used to compute the length of the thumb within the scrollbar's track. The range is expressed in arbitrary units that must be the same as the units used by @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeVerticalScrollRange_E@ and @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeVerticalScrollOffset_E@. The default extent is the drawing height of this view.

Returns: the horizontal extent of the scrollbar's thumb
computeHorizontalScrollExtent().Description: Compute the horizontal extent of the horizontal scrollbar's thumb within the horizontal range. This value is used to compute the length of the thumb within the scrollbar's track. The range is expressed in arbitrary units that must be the same as the units used by @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeHorizontalScrollRange_E@ and @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeHorizontalScrollOffset_E@. The default extent is the drawing width of this view.

Returns: the total vertical range represented by the vertical scrollbar The default range is the drawing height of this view.
computeVerticalScrollRange().Description: Compute the vertical range that the vertical scrollbar represents. The range is expressed in arbitrary units that must be the same as the units used by @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeVerticalScrollExtent_E@ and @B_android#support#v4#view#ScrollingView#computeVerticalScrollOffset_E@.

ClassDesc: An interface that can be implemented by Views to provide scroll related APIs.
